attributes.action: create a governing body/authority to which all car hire companies are answerable to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present car companies are unregulated which allows these companies to not only have carte blanche when holding your credit card details, (charging and not notifying you), but also gives customers little recourse when pursuing a complaint and/or reimbursement as they are under no obligation to respond.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
